articles.content: We're revisiting the AMD R7 2700 (and roughly 2700X, via the OC) in 2020, benchmarked freshly against the R9 3900X, 3700X, Intel i5-10600K, 10900K, and more for games, work, and power.Guarantee you g… [+3160 chars]
